{"id":905328811,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1677417435,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/905328811/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int solve(string &s, string &t, int ind1, int ind2,vector<vector<int>>&dp){\n        if(ind1==0) return ind2;\n        if(ind2==0) return ind1;\n        if(dp[ind1][ind2]!=-1) return dp[ind1][ind2];\n        if(s[ind1-1]==t[ind2-1]){\n            return dp[ind1][ind2]=solve(s,t,ind1-1, ind2-1,dp)+0;\n        }\n        else{\n            int del=solve(s,t,ind1-1,ind2  ,dp);\n            int rep=solve(s,t,ind1-1,ind2-1,dp);\n            int ins=solve(s,t,ind1,  ind2-1,dp);\n            return dp[ind1][ind2]=min({del,rep,ins})+1;\n        }\n    }\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n=word1.length();\n        int m=word2.length();\n        vector<vector<int>>dp(n+1, vector<int>(m+1, -1));\n        int ans=solve(word1, word2, n, m, dp);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false}
